thread.title: Giants lose to Rockies in emotional finale
thread.title_full: Giants lose to Rockies in emotional finale - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Shea
title: Giants lose to Rockies in emotional finale
text:
Photo: Brian Bahr, Getty Images Pitcher Jeremy Affeldt #41 of the San Francisco Giants tips his hat to the crowd during his retirement ceremony before a game against the Colorado Rockies at AT&T Park on October 4, 2015 in San Francisco, California, during the final day of the regular season.
Pitcher Jeremy Affeldt #41 of the San Francisco Giants tips his hat...
For a team that missed the playoffs and spent as much time in the trainer’s room as on the field, the Giants got a lot of love in the final days of their 84-78 season. Pitcher Jeremy Affeldt #41 of the San Francisco Giants tips his hat to the crowd during his retirement ceremony before a game against the Colorado Rockies at AT&T Park on October 4, 2015 in San Francisco, California, during the final day of the regular season.
Pitcher Jeremy Affeldt #41 of the San Francisco Giants tips his hat...
For a team that missed the playoffs and spent as much time in the trainer’s room as on the field, the Giants got a lot of love in the final days of their 84-78 season.
